SEO - Search Engines Optimization
Permalink
This is a permanent link that identifies uniquely the page
Meta-Title
The page title. It should be congruent with the page's text, it should always be compiled and is should be length 60 chars max
Meta-Description
Provide here a brief description of the page. This attribute should always be compiled
Meta-Keywords
This attribute is no longer used by several Search Engines, so you could quite leave it blank

Welcome to RedKite CMS
This is the RedKite CMS background and usually it should be hide. There are many reasons you are seeing it, the most common are:
The page and/or the language you have requested does not exist
The page has assigned a template not included in the theme you are using on your website
Your website has any page and/or language and/or theme
Something has gone wrong during the install process
